meanings.definition: Unable to be collected or recovered.
meanings.sent1: The lost toy was uncollectibles, as it was buried deep in the sand.
meanings.sent2: The broken vase was uncollectibles, beyond repair.
meanings.sent3: The uncollectibles puzzle pieces seemed to have vanished into thin air.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams of becoming a famous singer were as uncollectibles as the stars in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The uncollectibles memories of childhood faded with each passing year.

meanings.definition: Items that are unlikely to be paid or recovered.
meanings.sent1: The company's uncollectibles were piling up, causing financial strain.
meanings.sent2: The store had to write off the uncollectibles as a loss.
meanings.sent3: The uncollectibles in the attic turned out to be old newspapers and broken toys.
meanings.sent4: The uncollectibles in the abandoned house held secrets of the past.
meanings.sent5: The uncollectibles in the garage were a mix of forgotten tools and dusty books.
